question: Which do you see as top threats to your business?

best_practices.Phishing: Provide regular employee training on identifying and reporting phishing attempts. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
best_practices.Ransomware: Implement robust backup and recovery strategies; use advanced endpoint protection. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
best_practices.Insider threat: Enforce strict access controls and monitor privileged user activities. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
best_practices.Downtime: Develop and test a business continuity and disaster recovery plan. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
best_practices.Data breach: Encrypt sensitive data at rest and in transit; implement data loss prevention (DLP) solutions. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.

question: What technical controls are currently in place?

best_practices.Antivirus: Ensure all endpoints have up-to-date antivirus/antimalware software. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
best_practices.Firewalls: Maintain properly configured firewalls at network perimeters and on endpoints. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
best_practices.Encryption: Encrypt sensitive data at rest (e.g., disk encryption) and in transit (e.g., HTTPS, VPNs). Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
best_practices.VPN: Use VPNs for all remote access to the corporate network. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.

best_practices.None / Not sure: Prioritize deploying foundational technical controls: Antivirus, Firewalls, and data Encryption. Consider assigning an owner to this task and tracking progress in your risk register or compliance tool.
